src_original: kathañca punarasya vikalpasya parijñānaṃ bhavati /  catasṛbhiḥ paryeṣaṇābhiḥ caturvidhena ca yathābhūtaparijñānena /  catasraḥ paryeṣaṇāḥ katamāḥ /
nāmaparyeṣaṇā /  vastuparyeṣaṇā /  svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā ca /  viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā ca /
tatra nāmaparyeṣaṇā yadvodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati /
svabhāvaprajñaptau svabhāvaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /  viśeṣaprajñaptau viśeṣaprajñaptimātradarśanaṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇā /
nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgatañca yathābhūtaparijñānam /
